title: Secluded South Island Boutique Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Daily Bathing Experiences
description: When you’re seeking an escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, look no further than Maruia River Retreat, a tranquil haven cradled by mountains on New Zealand’s magnificent South Island. Make time to relax, recharge and reset at this secluded oasis nestled on a 500-acre estate, most of which is covered in native beech forest and boasts the sounds of the Maruia River as a permanent backing soundtrack. Stay in one of just seven luxurious villas, perfectly positioned deep in the lush native forest and experience laidback luxury during a welcome escape from reality. With a focus on meditation, rest and wholesome experiences, a stay here is sure to soothe your soul.
offer_address: 2314 Shenandoah Highway, State Highway 65, Tasman 7077, South Island, New Zealand

Find serenity and awaken your senses at your own pace, at the boutique Maruia River Retreat. Set along the magnificent Maruia River and protected by mountains from the east and west, the retreat is a stunning boutique lodge where guests can relax, reconnect, explore and celebrate. A stay at this intimate, secluded haven includes daily continental breakfast, a welcome hamper, gourmet picnic hamper and access to daily yoga classes.

title: Secluded South Island Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Unique Forest Bathing Experience
description:
You are invited to leave the world behind and reconnect with mind, body and soul at the idyllic Maruia River Retreat in Murchison, on New Zealand's South Island. Nestled within a 200-hectare estate (with 180 hectares made up of native beech forest), alongside the picturesque Maruia River, this is one of New Zealand’s leading wellness sanctuaries. Make time to relax, recharge and reset at this secluded adults-only retreat, where the practice of Japanese 'forest bathing' - taking long walks amid nature - is complemented by literal forest bathing in a secluded private hot tub, yoga classes (Friday to Sunday only) and exquisite cuisine.

Stay in one of just seven luxurious villas, perfectly positioned deep in the lush native forest, and experience laidback luxury during a welcome escape from reality. Surrounded by panoramic views of native beech forest, rugged mountain ranges, and the Maruia River, the retreat focuses on meditation, rest and wholesome experiences to soothe your soul.

**Your handpicked inclusions**

- Begin each day with continental breakfast at the Dining Lounge
- Rediscover tranquility with a daily one-hour chroma-sauna and private forest hot tub experience
- Toast your stay with a nightly glass of wine, beer or Little Biddy gin and tonic per person
- Relax with NZ$25 spa credit per villa, per stay
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with 12pm late checkout
- Find your zen with scheduled yoga classes (Friday to Sunday only)

**Master Villa Upgrade:** Take tranquility to the next level when you upgrade to a larger Master Villa (60sqm) with the added luxury of a romantic private spa jacuzzi in the ensuite.
offer_address: 2314 Shenandoah Highway, State Highway 65, Tasman 7077, South Island, New Zealand

title: New Zealand South Island Wellness Escape with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Forest Hot Tub Experience
description:
Nestled within a vast estate of beech forest on New Zealand's striking South Island, Nelson's most rejuvenating wellness retreat is surrounded by majestic mountains and unspoiled nature. The perfect place to disconnect from daily life, here you can listen for the gentle whispers of the Maruia River providing a soothing backdrop to your stay.

These boutique villas are tucked deep in the lush native forest, with the retreat offering an array of laidback indulgences and unique experiences. Enjoy magnesium pool swims, infrared chroma-therapy sauna sessions, river hot tub soaks and forest bathing. Explore the surrounding nature on peaceful forest walks and savour the tranquillity that comes with the secluded location.
offer_address: 2314 Shenandoah Highway, State Highway 65, Tasman 7077, South Island, New Zealand

title: Boutique Maruia River Retreat with Nature & Wellbeing Experiences
description:
Find serenity and awaken your senses at the boutique Maruia River Retreat, on New Zealand's South Island. Set along the magnificent Maruia River and reachable via a scenic drive from Nelson or Christchurch - or by helicopter if you wish to take the luxury up a notch - this blissfully secluded retreat is an adults-only oasis set within a 500-acre estate. With a collection of luxurious villas and cabins set deep into the lush native forest, daily yoga and meditation classes, and a spectacular spa offering a wide range of relaxing and rejuvenating treatments, this is the perfect destination to unwind from daily stresses, reconnect with nature and restore mind and body.

Your serene escape includes daily continental breakfast, a bottle of local wine on arrival, a gourmet picnic hamper and guided nature walk, a two-hour infrared sauna and forest bathing experience, and access to yoga and meditation classes.
offer_address: 2314 Shenandoah Highway, State Highway 65, Tasman 7077, South Island, New Zealand

title: New Zealand: Nelson Boutique Suites with Heated Pool & 5.5 Acres of Historic Gardens
description: Embrace boutique charm at Pihopa Retreat, a South Island garden escape perfect for a restful break from reality. These romantic suites sit a stone's throw from the centre of Nelson, from which you can explore natural splendours like Tasman Bay and rolling vineyards with a myriad of wineries to whet your whistle. Onsite delights include 5.5 acres of historic gardens, a heated pool and a working chapel dating back to 1877.
offer_address: 225 Waimea Road, Bishopdale, Nelson, 7011, New Zealand
